articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: CDPR Announces A Live-Action ‘Cyberpunk 2077’ Show (Or Movie) - Forbes
articles.description: The Cyberpunk 2077 project will be made with Anonymous Content, who has produced shows like True Detective and Mr. Robot, and movies like The Revenant and Spotlight.
articles.content:
Cyberpunk 2077
CDPR
Cyberpunk 2077 development may now be fully over after the release of Update 2.0 and Phantom Liberty, but in the wake of that redemption arc, CDPR has just announced that a live… [+2417 chars]

articles.title: Everything We Know About ‘Ahsoka’ Season 2 On Disney Plus - Forbes
articles.description: Will Ahsoka be getting a season 2? Here's what we know.
articles.content:
Ahsoka
Disney
The season finale of Ahsoka season 1 seemed to effectively demand a season 2, given all the cliffhangers (a literal cliffhanger, in Baylan Skolls case). However, unlike Andor, pre-pla… [+2627 chars]
